@dev set the tokamak Layer2 address
 @param _layer2 new the tokamak Layer2 address

@dev  request unstaking the wtonAmount in layer2 in tokamak
 @param _layer2 the layer2 address in tokamak

@dev process unstaking in layer2 in tokamak
 @param _layer2 the layer2 address in tokamak

exchangeWTONtoFLD(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: exchange holded WTON to FLD using uniswap-v3

params._kind: the function type, if 0, use exactInputSingle function, else if, use exactInput function

exchangeWTONtoFLDv2(uint256,uint256,uint.details: exchange holded WTON to FLD using uniswap-v2

params._kind: the function type, if 0, use exactInputSingle function, else if, use exactInput function

getUniswapInfo().details: get the addresses yhat used in uniswap interfaces

swapTONtoWTON(uint256,bool).details: Change the TON holded in contract have to WTON, or change WTON to TON.

params.toWTON: if it's true, TON->WTON , else WTON->TON

tokamakProcessUnStaking(address).details: process unstaking in layer2 in tokamak

tokamakRequestUnStaking(address,uint256).details: request unstaking the wtonAmount in layer2 in tokamak

tokamakRequestUnStakingAll(address).details: request unstaking the wtonAmount in layer2 in tokamak

tokamakStaking(address,uint256).details: staking the staked TON in layer2 in tokamak

params.stakeAmount: the amount that stake to layer2
